text: Nabiyow! Salat le waktil dacrisaay dudda luk kaa soolis;dohri ayro kelitta waktik xabba haanamaay barti dite edde makitta waktî fanah (Dohri Salaataay Qasriiy Magrib kee Qishâ Salat kinnuk), subci salat soolis kiraate edde ayxeerak, diggah subci salat barti malaykaa kee laqô malayka edde marta salat kinni, is ittal ciggiilak
